title: IAA Tonight | LeBron Commits to LA & Colts Preview
description: LeBron James signs a two year extension with the Lakers, which coincidently lines him up to be a free agent when his son Bronny could be coming to the NBA. But should the media be leaving Bronny alone? Also, do the Giants have a QB controversy brewing? We continue our Countdown to Kickoff discussing the Indianapolis Colts, who are hoping Matt Ryan can be the guy to get them over the top.
author: smanderville@houseofathlete.com (ashley nicole moss, lesean mccoy, leger douzable)
